name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 奇安信天守安全上网插件

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 拦截恶意网址，净化上网环境

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
开启天守安全软件的Chrome安全上网功能扩展，利用奇安信强大的攻防研究能力及实时更新的病毒库资源，实现快速拦截欺诈、钓鱼及挂马网站，阻止第三方跟踪代码，保护您的隐私及财产安全

注：
下载安装最新版天守安全软件客户端，才能实现以上功能
天守安全软件官网：https://ts.qianxin.com

奇安信科技集团股份有限公司已发展成为国内领先的基于大数据、人工智能和安全运营技术的网络安全供应商，向政府、企业用户提供新一代企业级网络安全产品和服务。同时，奇安信也是奥运史上首家网络安和杀毒软件赞助商。
long.en:
Open the chrome extension of TianShou security protection, and use Qi'anxin's powerful attack and defense research ability and real-time updated virus library resources to quickly intercept fraud, phishing and hanging horse websites, prevent third parties from tracking codes, and protect your privacy and property security

Note:
Download and install the latest version of TianShou security protection client to realize the above functions
TianShou security protection official website: https://ts.qianxin.com

Qi'anxin Technology Group Co., Ltd. has developed into a leading network security supplier based on big data, artificial intelligence and security operation technology in China, providing a new generation of enterprise network security products and services to government and enterprise users. At the same time, Qi'anxin is also the first sponsor of network security and anti-virus software in the history of the Olympic Games.
